post.text:
Join me LIVE at 4:00pmE in Charlotte, NC with Live coverage from Trump Tower after the rally.

Be a voter. Learn more >> www.Vote.GOP
Help us win. Contribute >> www.DonaldJTrump.com/Live

comment.author: Tristan
comment.text: ATTENTION.......Hillary supporters should report to their respective polling location on Nov. 9 due to overcrowding on Nov. 8

replies.author: Hanibal
replies.text: Not going to happen Tristan everyone knows when and where to go

replies.author: Tristan
replies.text: I hope so......thought it was funny though.

replies.author: Joshua
replies.text: They'll do anything for a buck, so tell them if they vote on the 9th they get $50 cash.
